title: Buy 2, get TRUMPSLIDE free
author: VD
content_html:
Crypto.Fashion is planning to introduce the TRUMPSLIDE 2020 shirts soon, but before they do, there is a small stock of glorious TRUMPSLIDE 2016 shirts left. So, purchase any two DLD shirts or hoodies, get a free Trumpslide 2016 in your choice of blue or red.

  • Order two shirts
  • Mention Trumpslide and the desired color, and size in the “Comments/Instructions” on the order form. 
Or you can simply order a TRUMPSLIDE shirt while they last. Believe me, wearing them in public is an absolute joy.
